info.title: Amo Market Admin API
info.description: This is the Admin API documentation for the Amo Market project.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all banners for the admin panel

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all banners for admin panel with optional sorting and filtering

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

post.description: Creates a new banner with optional image upload

status.description: Status of the banner (1 = active, 0 = inactive)

content_image_file.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif). Max 3MB

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

put.description: Retrieves a specific banner by its UUID.

message.example: No query results for model [App\\Models\\BannerPage] bc6e2b21-d3f0-4c61-b153-285555f940e7
You do not have permission to perform this action.

post.description: Updates a banner's details including title, shop_id, status, and optional content image.

banner_id.description: UUID of the banner to update

shop_id.description: UUID of the shop associated with the banner

status.description: Status of the banner (e.g., 1 for active, 0 for inactive)

content_image_file.description: Optional banner image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 3MB)

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

delete.description: Deletes a banner from the system using the provided banner ID.

id.description: UUID of the banner to delete

message.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

400.description: Validation error or incorrect old password
